Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: People have taken to social media to express a range of views on the upcoming federal budget. Some are concerned about gaps in the mental health system that need to be addressed while others are hopeful that funding for projects such as a new stadium in Tasmania will be approved. Many posts express frustration with the government's priorities and urge greater investment in support for vulnerable populations. Furthermore there is debate on whether economic theories like the Phillips curve remain relevant given current labor shortages. Overall social media is buzzing with calls for the government to do better for the Australian people.
